name: A Grain of Truth
description:
This Twine game is meant to serve as the 'proof-of-concept' for a speculative side-quest for The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt. The game uses a recreation of the conversation and quest system present in The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, with alternate ways to experience the story and multiple endings to discover.

Some dialogue options do not advance the story and are only there to provide additional information. Angle brackets (<>) indicate choices that will advance the narrative.
